Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • NPC
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Companion, Mob, Vendor

    public class NPC
extends java.lang.Object
    Every NPC type will extend this class that gives each NPC a name, health, conversation hashtable, and a current room that is read in from a file. Along with getters for each field.
    Author:
    Kaylee Payne, Jacques Troussard
